mapper.sql: roleID, roleName, sortNum, isCurrent, isDelete, theNote
mapper.select:
select a.roleID, a.roleName, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_role a
a.isDelete=1
and a.roleName like '%${roleName}%'
order by a.sortNum asc
select a.roleID, a.roleName, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_role a where a.isDelete=1 and a.roleID = #{roleID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
